attributes.action: Make changes to the school food/ catering system.
attributes.additional_details: People in mainly lower income areas are struggling financially due to the increase in gas and electric bills and an overall cost of living crisis, people aren't able to send they're children to school with enough money to get food. The families also may not be able to provide a lunch for the children at home, so school meals are the only way that these children can get the needed nutrition to survive. However, due to the price of food in schools, this is hard for families to pay for.
attributes.background: Change the prices and quality of the food that is provided in schools and colleges. Catering companies do not provide a high enough quality food to be charging the prices that they do. People cant afford meals for their children in school, and due to the cost of living crisis, this is getting worse.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a decision for individual schools and local authorities.
